docket_entries.description: Chapter 13 Voluntary Petition, Schedules and Statements (except for those listed below). The mailing list of creditors if not uploaded when the petition was filed, must be uploaded no later than 5 calendar days from the date of the filing of the petition. Failure to timely upload the list of creditors, may result in dismissal of the case without further notice. Electronic Filing Declaration due 07/20/2009, Schedules A-J due 07/14/2009. Statement of Financial Affairs due 07/14/2009, Attorney Disclosure Statement due 07/14/2009, Chapter 13 Plan due 07/14/2009, Debtor Statement of Current Monthly Income and Disposable Income due by 07/14/2009, Payment Advices Declaration Required by 11 USC Section 521(a)(1)(B)(iv) due by 07/14/2009, filed by BILL KING of BILL KING PC on behalf of PAUL G JOHNSON, MELISSA M JOHNSON (KING, BILL) (Entered: 06/29/2009)
